name: Orita Sinclair School of Design and Music

reviews.text: Very professional, good course learning experience, for someone completely new to music production. Managed to obtain a good overview of the entire music production process within a short time. Instructor Jan is engaging and approachable, with strong domain knowledge. Will recommend Mixing Music Professionally in your Home Studio course to anymore who wishes to get started in this space

I decided to join the 'WSQ Mixing professionally in your Home Studio'. I wanted to understand the concept of setting up home studios and the do'd and don'ts .. I must say that I am very pleased I joined. I cleared the doubts I had and learnt a whole lot more. Thanks to my instructor, Jan Gacayan, he is very knowledgeable and willing to always answer any questions..

Orita Sinclair is not only fun but insightful and worth the time and effort to attend. Facilities are great, lecturers are decorated, literally, with knowledge and industry know-hows. Do come and learn to your heart's content. Shout out to Jan, amazing lecturer.

I signed up for the WSQ "Mixing Professionally in Your Home Studio" course to level up my understanding of music production as I love music. Best decision ever. I encourage anyone wishing to start mixing music to sign up for this. The trainer Jan is very knowledgeable and shared tips and hacks beyond course notes when asked. Professional setup in the classroom is very conducive to learning. Thank you also to Raina for patiently answering my queries on the course!

I signed up for the WSQ Digital Live Sound Engineering course. Iâ€™ve been doing live sound for 2 years but had no formal training. This course helped me to get my foundations in live sound very solid, and the lecturer Jan was knowledgeable and very nurturing. Glad that I was part of it!
